Test Previous Next Selection In Website
open${base_url}/web_site_module/WebSiteModule_createTestSite/?id=test_web_site&title=Test Web SiteCreate a new site
assertTextPresentCreated Successfully.
open${base_url}/web_site_module/Zuite_waitForActivities
assertTextPresentDone.
open${base_url}/web_site_module/view?ignore_layout=1
clickAndWait//tr[@id=\'listbox_data_line_0\']/td[3]/a
clickfield_my_available_language_set
clickAndWait//button[@name=\'Base_edit:method\']
open${base_url}/web_site_module/WebSiteModule_createTestSite/?id=test_web_site_2&title=Test Web Site IICreate a second site
assertTextPresentCreated Successfully.
open${base_url}/web_site_module/Zuite_waitForActivities
assertTextPresentDone.
open${base_url}/web_site_module/view?ignore_layout=1
clickAndWait//tr[@id=\'listbox_data_line_0\']/td[3]/a
clickfield_my_available_language_set
clickAndWait//button[@name=\'Base_edit:method\']
clickAndWait//div[@id=\'context_bar\']/span[4]/span[1]/a[2]/span[1]
assertTitleWeb Site - test_web_site | ERP5
open${base_url}/web_site_module/view?ignore_layout=1
clickAndWait//tr[@id=\'listbox_data_line_1\']/td[3]/a
clickAndWait//div[@id=\'context_bar\']/span[4]/span[1]/a[4]/span[1]
assertTitleWeb Site - test_web_site_2 | ERP5
